Share extension is finally here!

Now you can add images to your Planoly grid from other apps such as Snapseed, Afterlight, VSCO, Canva, and many more.

Have questions or feedback?
email: support@planoly.com

Have questions or feedback?
email: support@planoly.com

LINE BREAKS in captions now works on Planoly. Better late than never.

Other updates:
- iPhone X design updates
- Move media between Drafts
- Copy caption directly from History

Need support or have feedback?
email: support@planoly.com

AUTO POSTING is finally here!!!

Schedule Instagram posts and we'll automatically post it to your Instagram account. It's currently only available for Instagram business profiles. Please visit our website for more information on restrictions.

More questions?
Email: support@planoly.com
Instagram: @planoly
Twitter: @planoly

Now you can save Drafts of your Stories.

This is great for Stories Takeover. You can save each takeover in a separate album and send them over to your Stories Planner when you're ready to use them.

Now you can save Drafts of your Stories.

NEW FEATURES ALERT:

- Regram easily by copying link on Instagram and press "+" in Planoly to import images/videos
- Add Captions to your Draft items for both Grid Drafts and Stories Drafts

Instagram: @planoly

NEW FEATURE ALERT:

PLANOLY's Pin Planner now has analytics on mobile for you to access right at the palm of your hand! Simply tap on the Graph icon at the bottom of your app, and see all the analytics for your Pins and Boards for the last 7, 30, or 90 days.

Questions or feedback?

NEW FEATURE ALERT:

Introducing PLANOLY's Pin Planner, our newest tool that allows you to visually plan, edit, and schedule your posts to Pinterest right within the PLANOLY app!

Managing your social media doesn't have to be complicated, and we're here to make it simple for you, no matter if you're using Instagram or Pinterest.

Questions or feedback?
Email: support@planoly.com
Instagram: @planoly
Twitter: @planoly

NEW FEATURE ALERT:

Scheduling content on the PLANOLY app just got a whole lot easier! Quick Schedule is officially on mobile. Now, you can easily (and seamlessly) schedule Instagram content for both your Instagram Grid and Stories by using our Quick Schedule feature.
Create preset times to schedule or auto-post your Instagram content. You can also enable your posts to schedule for 'Best Time To Post' dependent to when your own unique audience is most active on Instagram. We're here to help simplify content scheduling for you, with Quick Schedule on mobile!

Questions or feedback?
Email: support@planoly.com
Instagram: @planoly
Twitter: @planoly

Create preset times to schedule or auto-post your Instagram content. You can also enable your posts to schedule for 'Best Time To Post' dependent to when your own unique audience is most active on Instagram. We're here to help simplify content scheduling for you, with Quick Schedule on mobile!

Questions or feedback?

NEW FEATURE ALERT:

Social Calendar is now on iOS! You’ll have access to social events as well as PLANOLY events, to strategically plan your content, tasks, assignments, and happenings throughout the year! We’ve integrated the PLANOLY Social Calendar into both our WEB Dashboard & MOBILE App to make it easier than ever for you to strategize for the months ahead.

Questions or feedback?

Email: support@planoly.com
Instagram: @planoly

NEW FEATURES:
- Does that white background ever hurt your eyes whenever you’re planning your posts at night on PLANOLY? If so, we’ve got just the thing - Dark mode! Your eyes can thank us later.
- And, for all PLANOLY newbies out there, we’ve made it easier than ever for you to learn how to manually publish to Instagram. We’ll walk you through how to complete manual posting when you’re attempting it for the first time, and then set you free to do it on your own confidently! This way, you won't be surprised about any disappearing posts. You’ll be a PRO in no time.
- We also squashed a few bugs.

NEW FEATURES:
- Does that white background ever hurt your eyes whenever you’re planning your posts at night on PLANOLY? If so, we’ve got just the thing - Dark mode! Your eyes can thank us later.
- And, for all PLANOLY newbies out there, we’ve made it easier than ever for you to learn how to manually publish to Instagram. We’ll walk you through how to complete manual posting when you’re attempting it for the first time, and then set you free to do it on your own confidently! This way, you won't be surprised about any disappearing posts. You’ll be a PRO in no time.
- We also squashed a few bugs.

What’s New
- Simplified account switcher so now you can toggle seamlessly between your multiple accounts for Instagram & Pinterest
- Added ability to auto post videos to Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter via the “Post Now” option
- Included Google Drive and Dropbox as options when uploading content to Pinterest

Bug Fixes
- iPhone 11 Pro Max users now can see billing plans correctly

What’s New
- Simplified account switcher so now you can toggle seamlessly between your multiple accounts for Instagram & Pinterest
- Added ability to auto post videos to Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter via the “Post Now” option
- Included Google Drive and Dropbox as options when uploading content to Pinterest

Bug Fixes
- iPhone 11 Pro Max users now can see billing plans correctly
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s New
- Social Calendar Notes are now repeatable in PLANOLY
- Grid and Stories posts now can be swapped when planning content on grid
- “ADD QUICK SCHEDULE TIME” is now available in Pin Planner when creating pins for
campaigns! This feature allows you to populate best times each day for a Pin - helping to save you time and maximize your reach on Pinterest

Goodbye bugs, hello enhancements
- Auto-post errors will display when sharing content to Facebook and Twitter fails

- Social Calendar Notes are now repeatable in PLANOLY

- “ADD QUICK SCHEDULE TIME” is now available in Pin Planner when creating pins for
campaigns! This feature allows you to populate best times each day for a Pin - helping to save you time and maximize your reach on Pinterest

Goodbye bugs, hello enhancements
- Auto-post errors will display when sharing content to Facebook and Twitter fails

What’s New
We heard your request for uploading video Pins and we’re making it happen! Users will soon have the ability in Pin Planner to upload videos to create Video Pins for Pinterest on our mobile app. Plus, we fixed some bugs so now free users can upload and import their missing IGTV and Reels posts after their 30 free uploads.

What’s New
We heard your request for uploading video Pins and we’re making it happen! Users will soon have the ability in Pin Planner to upload videos to create Video Pins for Pinterest on our mobile app. Plus, we fixed some bugs so now free users can upload and import their missing IGTV and Reels posts after their 30 free uploads.

WHAT’S NEW: Version 3.46

Your profile just got a lot more interactive! We now show you the latest alerts in your activity and settings center. They help you discover more of what PLANOLY has to offer. Plus, free users can now easily see their monthly uploads when uploading content

WHAT’S NEW: Version 3.46

Your profile just got a lot more interactive! We now show you the latest alerts in your activity and settings center. They help you discover more of what PLANOLY has to offer. Plus, free users can now easily see their monthly uploads when uploading content

WHAT’S NEW: Version 3.47

Say no more to having a faulty grid! By popular request, now control the placement of missing IGTV or Reels on your grid. When inserting your missing IGTV or Reels URL to your grid, drag and drop it wherever it aligns with your Instagram account. Plus, our premium features are highlighted even more!

WHAT’S NEW: Version 3.47

Say no more to having a faulty grid! By popular request, now control the placement of missing IGTV or Reels on your grid. When inserting your missing IGTV or Reels URL to your grid, drag and drop it wherever it aligns with your Instagram account. Plus, our premium features are highlighted even more!
